alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:23PM EDT until March 31 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern White County in northwestern Indiana... Fulton County in north central Indiana... Pulaski County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Cass County in north central Indiana... Southern Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Marshall County in north central Indiana... * Until 1115 PM EDT/1015 PM CDT/. * At 1023 PM EDT/923 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near La Crosse to near Wheatfield to near Rensselaer, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Rochester, Winamac, Monon, North Judson, Argos, Culver, Francesville, Royal Center, Medaryville, Pulaski, Walnut, Tippecanoe, Ripley, Kewanna, Fulton, Monterey, Beardstown, Nyena Lake, Clarks and Star City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/ for north central and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White
